title: Shi Shaoxia Gunjue Hao Gudan
overview: Shi Zhou Wu is the elder brother of the Ren Tian faction. Since childhood, he has devoted himself to martial arts and does not pay attention to worldly affairs. He is serious, does not smile and is often afraid of others. Once, at a martial arts conference, he was surrounded by too many knight couples, which greatly excited his spirit, causing a feeling of invincible loneliness. So he decided to find his own happy marriage.
